topic.title: Information Retrieval with algorithms
topic.description: Using algorithms for effective Information Retrieval
topic.narrative: Retrieve documents relevant to the query terms "information retrieval" and "algorithms"

topic.title: misspellings in queries
topic.description: Which documents cover query spelling autocorrection?
topic.narrative: Relevant Information Retrieval documents cover the topic of misspellings in search engine queries and how to automatically correct them. Documents containing only the words "queries" or "in" are not relevant.

topic.title: information in different language
topic.description: Which papers cover Cross-language information retrieval
topic.narrative: Relevant papers cover concepts, that fall under the category CLIR. Papers on language or information on their own or in another context are not relevant.
